intro:
Guess the world. Learn the world. Master the map.
Discover new countries, cities, and landmarks!
description:
How accurately can you place locations on a world map?
Test your geography instincts, map intuition, and global knowledge with Geo IQ World Master—the educational and competitive exploration game that challenges you to pinpoint locations across the globe.

In each round, you’ll be given a country, city, iconic landmark, historical area, or tourist spot, and your mission is simple: guess its location as precisely as possible.
The closer your guess, the higher your score.

Geo IQ World Master blends search-friendly concepts such as geography quizzes, world map knowledge, location guessing, country–city challenges, and map trivia, turning learning into a fun, intuitive experience. To sharpen your skills, the game includes an intelligent “geo guesser” system designed to help you improve your predictions based on global clues and patterns.

As you progress, you’ll encounter new countries, new cities, lesser-known regions, and culturally diverse locations. With every level, you naturally build a deeper understanding of continents, global areas, UNESCO sites, and world-famous destinations.

You’ll also unlock special themed categories that elevate the experience:

Ancient Cities: Lost cities and historic centers of ancient civilizations

War Locations: Key battlefields and strategic locations that shaped history

Touristic Places: The world’s most visited attractions and iconic landmarks

These themes transform Geo IQ World Master from a simple map quiz into a true world discovery journey—a blend of learning, challenge, exploration, and mastery. Players learn through a “guess and learn” system while exploring global cultures, historical events, architectural wonders, and tourism hot spots.

Whether you’re aiming to master world geography on your own or compete against friends, Geo IQ World Master offers a uniquely rewarding adventure for every geography enthusiast.

The world is a vast map waiting for you to explore it. Are you ready?
